data.description: MySQL Vhost manager for use with Apache.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
There are no real modules that can load virtual hosts from a SQL
    database for apache. That's why I wrote this. It requires
    configuration reload, but it works very well, and with quite
    extended functionality and it's easy expandable.The website is not
    up yet, unfortunately.
